de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mapping

Interface IStoreObjectFactory<F>


  • public interface IStoreObjectFactory<F>
    A factory which creates instances of IStoreObject which are suitable for the current IDataStore

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> void createStoreObject(F storedObject, IMapper<T> mapper, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<IStoreObject<T,?>>> handler)
      Creates a new instance of IStoreObject by using the information from the given stored object from the IDataStore.
      <T> void createStoreObject(IMapper<T> mapper, T entity, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<IStoreObject<T,?>>> handler)
      Creates a new instance of IStoreObject by using the information from the given entity.
      <T> void createStoreObjects(IMapper<T> mapper, java.util.List<T> entities, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.util.List<IStoreObject<T,?>>>> handler)
      Creates a List of IStoreObject by using the informations of the given instances.

    • Method Detail

      • createStoreObject

        <T> void createStoreObject(IMapper<T> mapper,
                           T entity,
                           io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<IStoreObject<T,?>>> handler)
        Creates a new instance of IStoreObject by using the information from the given entity. The entity is converted into the format, which can be used to save it into the IDataStore
        Parameters:
        mapper - the mapper for the entity to be handled
        entity - the entity
        handler - the handler to be recalled

      • createStoreObjects

        <T> void createStoreObjects(IMapper<T> mapper,
                            java.util.List<T> entities,
                            io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.util.List<IStoreObject<T,?>>>> handler)
        Creates a List of IStoreObject by using the informations of the given instances. All entities are converted into the format, which can be used to save into the IDataStore
        Parameters:
        mapper - the mapper for the entity to be handled
        entities - the pojos to be converted
        handler - the handler to be recalled

      • createStoreObject

        <T> void createStoreObject(F storedObject,
                           IMapper<T> mapper,
                           io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<IStoreObject<T,?>>> handler)
        Creates a new instance of IStoreObject by using the information from the given stored object from the IDataStore. The informations from the storedObject are used to create a suitable POJO
        Parameters:
        storedObject - the stored object from the IDataStore
        mapper - the mapper
        handler - the handler to be recalled
